website_summaries.verdict: Sometimes the best toys are the simplest, and Curious George’s well-made old-school wooden car is pure uncomplicated fun.
pros: Designed to last the toughest of playtimes

customer_reviews.title: Super cute Curious George in a car that really works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy for 2 year old boy that we bought for at Christmas time (from Angel tree). He liked Curious George and cars and when I came across this item I just had to order it. I thought the quality was great. The wheels worked well and it seemed like it would hold up well under toddler use. I can't say how he ended up liking the item; however, I would definitely recommend this item and buy it again if need similar item for toddler boy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made, bright colors, love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This Curious George car is very well made. The colors are bright and it is painted very well. It has been played with a lot, dropped, thrown, and still looks brand new. I would definitely recommend this for a toy to be played with or a collectible.
customer_reviews.author: Arkansas GG

customer_reviews.title: Curious George and our Grandson
customer_reviews.text: This product is so cute and well made. Looking forward to seeing our grandson Play with it on Christmas day.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality wood car. My son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... year - I'm a kid at heart and always loved the little guy
customer_reviews.text: I have it under my Christmas tree - in fact will keep it up all year - I'm a kid at heart and always loved the little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Alan B. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: as pictured
customer_reviews.text: wheels move and can be used as toy or shelf decoration. easy to handle. simple, retro. no small plastic parts or detailed metal.
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy for toddler to use. Quality item that will be enjoyed for years.
customer_reviews.author: Miss.Speedstar

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My child love playing with this product. It rolls effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: jengee2

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves curious george an dnow this car is with him everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Lendra

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars from the grandmother of a 2 1/2 yr old and that boy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves George so one of his Santa gifts was this car. It's very durable, very "drive-able" and has that much loved monkey at the wheel. So we're both happy with the purchase. (I help Santa out sometimes)
customer_reviews.author: Observant1

customer_reviews.title: Great wood car
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car for my nephew in order to push me over the free shipping limit of 35 dollars, and was the best built little wooden car i have seen in some time, i would defently buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Otterby

customer_reviews.title: George is a star with the 18 month group
customer_reviews.text: Anything made out of wood is a good toy these days since most are plastic. This is small and light and easy for a little hand to grasp and carry. I see it out on the table a lot when I visit so I assume it is being played with by my grandson who loves Curious George and anything with wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Blueskies

customer_reviews.title: great toy!
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my grandson who love's CG. My daughter wants mostly wooden toys for him....so I pleased both of them with this purchase. The car goes really fast. My 21 month old grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.author: VPL

customer_reviews.title: Rolls well
customer_reviews.text: Very cute for a cake. Good size. It is heavy weight. Kids have played with it some.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Sadewasser

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a Curious George fan!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew's first birthday and he loves it! The wheels are metal so it rolls around smoothly both on carpet and hard floors. Definitely a great purchase!

customer_reviews.title: What a classic!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Purchased this as a cake topper for my nephews 3rd birthday!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves

customer_reviews.title: Fun George

customer_reviews.title: Curious George Gets a Ferrari
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toy for twin three-year-old boys. Durable, heavy enough to stand up to normal use, rolls great -- a terrific addition to their playbox.
customer_reviews.author: GT77

customer_reviews.title: Great as a cake decoration!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure this would be much fun as a stand-alone toy, but we got this to put on top of a birthday cake for a Curious George fan. It was perfect!!! And, he ended up saving it and carries it around in his pocket as a momento :)
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Great little toy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2 year old grandson to go along with a Curious George book I also got him for Christmas. The toy is actually better constructed than I thought it would be. He immediately recognized George and enjoys playing with the toy along with his other cars.

customer_reviews.title: Great as cake topper and toy!

customer_reviews.title: Cute, old-fashioned look
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a decoration for my son's curious george bedroom, but he actually gets it down and plays with it often. It is good quality and rolls very well. It rolls better than most of his toy cars, so he likes to race with it.

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy.

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this toy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this vintage toy. A perfect addition to my son's collection of Curious George toys. The price was much lower here on Amazon than any other retailers that sold this same exact toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A simple but fun toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Curious George and rolling cars in the living room. I love that the wheels are big and roll smoothly across the carpet or hardwood floors. The car is made of wood and so far has withstood my sons play. Because the rolling is so smooth it goes really fast, which makes this a great toy for my 2yr old son!

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and a Nice Toy!
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves this wooden car. He often uses it with his wooden Thomas the train set.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality

customer_reviews.title: Well made, more for grandpa than grand kid
customer_reviews.text: It is well made,it is still intact after a month or two, however the style is more for grandpa than grand kid. It is pretty neat though. The big wheels turn easily even in the back yard and on carpet. Bright colors and the still popular Curious George motive are attractive to the 3 year old little guy.

Thought about re-gluing him but afraid to ruin the toy. I will say it was very popular, I had to put in my car numerous of times because the vendor kept selling out.

product_meta.title: Curious George Wooden Car by Schylling - Childrens Wooden Toy
product_meta.description:
AMAZON.COM
This Curious George car may as well have come off a toy shelf from the 1950s. It has that sturdy, old-time quality workmanship, with carved wood in brightly painted colors of red and yellow. Plus it has the nostalgia of Curious George himself, now experiencing a well-deserved revival. The little monkey, with his gleeful, innocent smile, is driving this hot rod. Perhaps his curiosity led him to accidentally borrow it from the "Man with the Yellow Hat." Or maybe he was investigating a car race when suddenly he found himself careening down the racetrack, having the time of his life. The possibilities are endless, just as this beloved storybook character and toy are timeless. --Gail Hudson

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
See Curious George go whipping by in his fabulous wooden car with rubber wheels.
feature_bullets: The classic car for the world's most beloved monkey, solid wood, bright red with his name on the side
Solidly and durably built, the Curious George car is hours of vehicle play fun, and just the right size for small hands, 5 x 3.5 inches
Drive all over the house, the bright yellow wheels have rubber treads so they won't mar floors or funtiture
Completely child safe and non-toxic using only the best, safety-tested paints and stains
A great first car for kids 3+

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars141 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
